CRC.BK.long_name: Central Retail Corporation Public Company Limited
CRC.BK.summary: Central Retail Corporation Public Company Limited operates as a multi-format multi-category retailing platform in Southeast Asia and Italy. It operates through Fashion, Hardline, and Food segments. The company sells fashion merchandise and other consumer products; consumer electronics, home decoration, construction materials, and DIY products; and grocery, organic and health foods, beverages, and consumer staples under a portfolio of retail banners. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 1,934 stores across 51 provinces in Thailand; 132 stores across 37 provinces in Vietnam; and 9 department stores in 8 cities in Italy. Central Retail Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MAKRO-R.BK.summary: Siam Makro Public Company Limited operates cash and carry trade centers under the Makro name. It operates through Cash And Carry, and Food Services segments. The company's trade centers sell food and non-food products to registered members, including small and medium-sized businesses, retailers, caterers, professional sectors, and institutions. It imports, exports, and distributes fresh vegetables and fruits, meats, seafoods, dairy products, frozen and chilled foods, etc.; beverages, snacks, cleaning supplies, cosmetic, toiletries and cleaning products, etc.; electrical appliances, kitchenware, and equipment used in hotels, restaurants and catering businesses; and apparels, stationery, office supplies, sports equipment, home appliances, etc. In addition, the company engages in the provision of freight, delivery rental, and storage services; and marketing and consulting services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 144 stores, including 79 Classic stores, 30 Foodservice stores, 15 Eco Plus stores, 5 Food Shops, 1 Fresh@Makro stores, and 7 Siam Frozen shops in Thailand; and 7 stores internationally, as well as stores in India under the LOTS Wholesale Solutions brand. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Siam Makro Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Siam Makro Holdings (Thailand) Limited.
